title: Boston National Historical Park: Current Conditions
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Current Conditions             Alerts & Conditions         Alerts    Information        Bunker Hill Monument is temporarily closed to climbing today  Alert 1 , Severity ,information ,, Bunker Hill Monument is temporarily closed to climbing today  The Bunker Hill Monument is temporarily closed to climbing due to excessive heat.          Evening Tour of the Charlestown Navy Yard is Cancelled tonight  Alert 2 , Severity ,information ,, Evening Tour of the Charlestown Navy Yard is Cancelled tonight   Due to the severity of the weather forecast for tonight the Evening Navy Yard Tour will be cancelled.
